pr_title: Fix(tests): Fix controller tests and add more.

timeline.message: Fix(tests): Fix controller tests and add more.

timeline.bodyText: I used to be in favor of checking the substrings in messages, but now I worry that it causes us to need to update the tests too often, which, in turn, causes the tests to be less valuable. I would be more comfortable having the fail at line 41 and nothing in the catch block (maybe an assertNotNull).
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I have changed to an assertNotNull for the message.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: Refactor(tests): Use composition rather than inheritance for test setup.
